item.description:
You won’t want to miss this one!  This meeting will include some vital information regarding operations at our recently decommissioned class D towers.

Come early and check out some Cirrus aircraft that will be on display prior to the meeting!

After a short (but interesting) meeting regarding our new hangar progress we will have

I am very excited to say Bob Adelizzi, an FPA member, ATC  Grand-master, and favored meeting speaker, has agreed to come speak to us at April’s meeting regarding the upcoming Tower closings (e.g. operations, what to watch out for, and how to keep safe).

Remember, be sure of any changes at your destination and keep in mind not everyone is as proficient at busy non-towered airports as Fitchburg pilots are!


Bill Grohs, of William J. Grohs Aviation inc. A specialty aviation insurance brokerage firm that provides complete insurance coverage’s for the light aircraft owner or renter to the fortune 500 jet aircraft operator.

Having been in the aviation insurance business since 1988, they pride themselves on their trustworthy, reliable, dependable, and knowledgeable service. The staff boasts dedicated brokers with almost 50 years combined aviation insurance experience.

So bring all your Aviation insurance questions for this one!

“As always Food at 6:00 Meeting at 7:00”

Did you get your Oshkosh raffle ticket yet?


Check back here for additional news as the meeting gets closer!

 

Where else can you have this much excitement for $30bucks a year?

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
